file_handler module¶

file_handler.save_pickle_obj(obj, filename)¶

Saves a Python object

Input

@obj Instance to save @filename Absolute path where to save including filename

file_handler.load_pickle_obj(filename)¶

Loads a Python object

Input

@filename Absolute path to the file

file_handler.save_to_json(data, filename)¶

Saves data to JSON

Input

@data Data to be serialized as a JSON @filename Absolute path where to save including filename

file_handler.load_from_json(filename)¶

Loads a JSON

Input

@filename Absolute path to the file
